snippet: KRASSNER--Jeff, died unexpectedly on June 27, 2016 at age 62. He was a one of a kind source of love, kindness and fun! He made our lives richer, and we will miss him dearly. Spence Halperin and Family 1/3...
lead_paragraph: KRASSNER--Jeff, died unexpectedly on June 27, 2016 at age 62. He was a one of a kind source of love, kindness and fun! He made our lives richer, and we will miss him dearly. Spence Halperin and Family 1/3
